original: yena satyena satyavacanena ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,
analyzed: yena satyena satya vacanena aham vyākṛtaḥ anuttarasyām samyaksaṃbodhau taiḥ paurvakaiḥ tathāgataiḥ arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ

original: anena satyena satyavacanena ayam amanuṣyabhūto 'pakrāmatu. tatra māraḥ pāpīyān autsukyam āpatsyate,
analyzed: anena satyena satya vacanena ayam amanuṣya bhūtaḥ apakrāmatu tatra māraḥ pāpīyān autsukyam āpatsyate

original: kim ity ayam amanuṣyabhūto 'pakrāmet. tata kasya hetos?
analyzed: kim iti ayam amanuṣya bhūtaḥ apakrāmet tata kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi māraḥ pāpīyān balavattaraṃ ca tejovattaraṃ ca tatra autsukyam āpatsyate,
analyzed: tathā hi māraḥ pāpīyān balavattaram ca tejovattaram ca tatra autsukyam āpatsyate

original: katham ayam amanuṣya ito 'pakrāmed iti. evaṃ sa māra adhiṣṭhānena tato 'pakramiṣyati. evaṃ ca tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhaviṣyati:
analyzed: katham ayam amanuṣyaḥ itas apakrāmet iti evam sa māraḥ adhiṣṭhānena tatas apakramiṣyati evam ca tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhaviṣyati

original: mamaiṣo 'nubhāvena amanuṣyo 'pakrānto. na punar evaṃ jñāsyati:
analyzed: mama eṣaḥ anubhāvena amanuṣyaḥ apakrāntaḥ na punar evam jñāsyati

original: mārānubhāvenaiṣo 'manuṣyo 'pakrānta iti. sa tena anyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamaṃsyate ullapiṣyati uccagghiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyaty:
analyzed: māra anubhāvena eṣaḥ amanuṣyaḥ apakrāntaḥ iti sa tena anyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamaṃsyate ullapiṣyati uccagghiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyati

original: ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair,
analyzed: aham vyākṛtaḥ anuttarasyām samyaksaṃbodhau taiḥ paurvakaiḥ tathāgataiḥ arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ

original: ete punar anye na vyākṛtā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, (AdSPG I 8)
analyzed: ete punar anye na vyākṛtāḥ anuttarasyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: sa tāvanmātrakeṇa mānaṃ vardhayiṣyati mānam utpādayiṣyati,
analyzed: sa tāvanmātrakeṇa mānam vardhayiṣyati mānam utpādayiṣyati

analyzed: dūrīkariṣyati sarva ākārajña tām dūrīkariṣyati anuttaram buddha jñānam sa tathārūpaḥ sattvaḥ tāvatā an upāya kuśalaḥ adhimānam utpādayiṣyati

original: tasya dve bhūmī pratikāṅkṣitavye. katame dve bhūmī?

original: teṣāṃ api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ima eva bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ mātāpitarau bhūvan. ye
analyzed: teṣām api buddhānām bhagavatām ime eva bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ mātā pitarau bhūvan ye

analyzed: api te subhūte bhaviṣyanti anāgate adhvani tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ teṣām

original: api subhūte buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ima eva bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ mātāpitarau bhaviṣyanti.
analyzed: api subhūte buddhānām bhagavatām ime eva bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ mātā pitarau bhaviṣyanti

original: yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
analyzed: yāpayanti dharmam ca deśayanti

original: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ima eva bodhipakṣyā dharmā mātāpitarau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: teṣām api buddhānām bhagavatām ime eva bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ mātā pitarau tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte ato niiyātā atītānāgata pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantas. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte atas atīta anāgata pratyutpannāḥ buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim

original: buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitukāmena,
analyzed: buddhakṣetram pariśodhayitu kāmena

analyzed: sattvām paripācayitu kāmena

analyzed: caturbhiḥ saṃgraha vastubhiḥ sattvāḥ saṃgṛhītavyāḥ katamaiḥ caturbhiḥ

original: yaduta dānena priyavacane na arthacaryayā samānārthatayā. imam apy ahaṃ subhūte arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyann evaṃ vadāmi:
analyzed: yat uta dānena priya vacane na artha caryayā samāna artha tayā imam api aham subhūte artha vaśam saṃpaśyan evam vadāmi

original: ete bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śāstāro mātāpitarau
analyzed: ete bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām śāstāraḥ mātā pitarau

original: layanaṃ trāṇaṃ dvīpaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ yaduteṣā eva bodhipakṣyā dharmā. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena  #
analyzed: layanam trāṇam dvīpam śaraṇam parāyaṇam yat uta īṣāḥ eva bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmā tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena apara praṇeya tām gantu kāmena

original: aparapraṇeyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena,
analyzed: apara praṇeya tāyām sthātu kāmena

original: sarvasattvānāṃ saṃśayāṃc chetukāmena,

original: buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitukāmena,
analyzed: buddhakṣetram pariśodhayitu kāmena

original: sattvāṃś ca paripācayitukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ te dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam. subhūtir āha:
analyzed: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyām te dharmāḥ vistareṇa upadiṣṭāḥ yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam subhūtiḥ āha

original: kiṃlakṣaṇā bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā?

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: ākāśāsaṃgalakṣaṇā (AdSPG I 18)
analyzed: ākāśa āsaṃga lakṣaṇā

original: subhūte prajñāparamitā. na subhūte prajñāpāramitā [f. 219b] lakṣaṇaṃ,
analyzed: subhūte prajñāparamitā na subhūte prajñāpāramitā f lakṣaṇam

original: syād bhagavaṃ paryāyo yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tena lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyeran?
analyzed: syāt bhagavan paryāyaḥ yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tena lakṣaṇena sarva dharmāḥ saṃvidyeran

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: evam etat subhūte evam etat yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tenaiva lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam etat subhūte evam etat yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tena eva lakṣaṇena sarva dharmāḥ saṃvidyante tat kasya hetoḥ

original: sarvadharmā hi subhūte viviktasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāḥ. anena subhūte paryāyeṇa yena lakṣaṇeṇa prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate,
analyzed: sarva dharmāḥ hi subhūte vivikta svabhāvāḥ sarva dharmāḥ svabhāva śūnyāḥ anena subhūte paryāyeṇa yena lakṣaṇeṇa prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate

original: tena lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyante. yaduta śūnyatālakṣaṇena viviktalakṣaṇena. āha:

original: yadi bhagavaṃ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmair viviktāḥ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyās,
analyzed: yadi bhagavam sarva dharmāḥ sarva dharmaiḥ viviktāḥ sarva dharmāḥ sarva dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ

original: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānaṃ prajñāyate. na hi bhagavaṃ viviktam saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate,
analyzed: tat katham bhagavan sattvānām saṃkleśa vyavadānam prajñāyate na hi bhagavan viviktam saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate

original: na sūnyatā saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate. na viviktaṃ na?
analyzed: na sūnya tā saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate na viviktam na

original: śūnyatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. na viviktena śūnyatāyāṃ kaścid
analyzed: śūnyatā anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate na viviktena śūnyatāyām kaścid

analyzed: dharmaḥ upalabhyate na viviktena śūnyatāyām sattvaḥ upalabhyate yaḥ bodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta

original: asya bhagavaṃ vayaṃ bhāṣitasya katham arthan ājānīyāma?

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte dīrgharātraṃ sattvā ahaṃkāramamakāre caranti?

original: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv ahaṃkāramamakāreṇa sattvāḥ saṃsaranti saṃdhāvanti. āha:

original: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugataḥ. ahaṃkāramamakāreṇa sattvāḥ saṃdhāvanti saṃsaranti. bhagavān āha:

original: evaṃ caraṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carali,
analyzed: evam caram bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ na rūpe

original: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne carati. na caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati yāvan na aṣṭādaśeṣv āveṇikeṣu buddharmeṣu carati.  #
analyzed: na vedanāyām na saṃjñāyām na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne carati na caturṣu smṛti upasthāneṣu carati yāvat na aṣṭādaśeṣu āveṇikeṣu buddha rmeṣu carati  /

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi te dharmā nopalabhyante yaś cared yata vā cared yatra vā cared. evaṃ caraṃ
analyzed: tathā hi te dharmāḥ na upalabhyante yaḥ caret vā caret yatra vā caret evam caran

original: śakyam abhibhavitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: śakyam abhibhavitum tat kasya hetoḥ

original: abhyāśī bhavati. bhagavān āha:

analyzed: tān kaścid eva kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karma patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet

analyzed: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣu apramāṇeṣu catasriṣu ārūpya samāpattīṣu yāvat srotaāpatti phale sakṛdāgamī phale anāgāmī phale arhat tve pratyeka bodhau

original: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet?
analyzed: tat kim manyase subhūte api nu sa kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā tatonidānam bahu puṇyam prasavet

original: āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata. bhagavān āha:
analyzed: āha bahu bhagavan bahu sugata bhagavān āha

original: ataḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved, ya

original: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pareṣām ācakṣīta deśayet prakāśayet prasthāpayed vivared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiś  #

original: ca manasikārair viharet,
analyzed: ca manasikāraiḥ viharet

original: sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati. tat kasya hetos?

original: te mahākaruṇām abhinirharanti,

analyzed: pratilabhante ayam subhūte bodhisattvānām mahāsattvanām mahān prajñā lokaḥ yat uta

analyzed: dāna pāramitā lokaḥ śīla pāramitā lokāḥ kṣānti pāramitā lokaḥ vīrya pāramitā lokaḥ dhyāna pāramitā lokaḥ

original: prajñāpāramitālokaḥ. anabhisaṃbuddhā api te kulaputrāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchanti,
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā lokaḥ an abhisaṃbuddhāḥ api te kula putrāḥ sarva sattvānām dakṣiṇīya tām gacchanti

original: [f. 220b] te prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair viharanto dāyakadānapatīnāṃ
analyzed: te prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ viharantaḥ dāyaka dānapatīnām

original: dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayanti,

original: tat kāryaṃ karoti. sā ca prajñāpāramitā avikalpā. athāyuṣmāñc chāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:

original: [f. 229b] kiṃ punar āyuṣmaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāiva avikalpā utāho dhyānapāramitā api,
analyzed: kim punar āyuṣman subhūte prajñāpāramitā iva avikalpā uta aho dhyāna pāramitā api

original: yāvad dānapāramitā apy avikalpā?
analyzed: yāvat dāna pāramitā api avikalpā

original: subhūtir āha:

original: dhyānapāramitā apy āyuṣmañc chāradvātīputra avikalpā. yāvad dānapāramitā apy avikalpā. āha:

original: kiṃ punar āyuṣmaṃ subhūte rūpam apy avikalpaṃ yāvad vijñānam apy avikalpaṃ?
analyzed: kim punar āyuṣman subhūte rūpam api a vikalpam yāvat vijñānam api a vikalpam

original: cakṣur apy avikalpaṃ yāvad mano 'py avikalpaṃ?
analyzed: cakṣuḥ api avikalpam yāvat manaḥ api avikalpam

original: kiṃ punar rūpam apy avikalpaṃ (AdSPG I 57)
analyzed: kim punar rūpam api a vikalpam

original: yāvad dharmam apy avikalpaṃ?
analyzed: yāvat dharmam api avikalpam

original: cakṣurvijñānam
analyzed: cakṣuḥ vijñānam

original: apy avikalpaṃ yāvad manovijñānam apy avikalpaṃ?

analyzed: cakṣuḥ saṃsparśaḥ api avikalpaḥ yāvat manaḥ saṃparśaḥ api avikalpaḥ

analyzed: cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa jāḥ api vedanāḥ avikalpāḥ yāvat manaḥ saṃsparśa jāḥ api vedanāḥ avikalpāḥ

original: kiṃ punar dhyānāny apramāṇāny ārūpyasamāpattayo 'py avikalpā?
analyzed: kim punar dhyānāni apramāṇāni ārūpya samāpattayaḥ api avikalpā

original: smṛtyupasthānāny api yāvan mārgo 'pi śūnyatā ānimittam apraṇihitam apy avikalpaṃ?
analyzed: smṛti upasthānāni api yāvat mārgaḥ api śūnyatā ānimittam apraṇihitam api avikalpam

original: kiṃ punar daśatathāgatabalāni. catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī

original: saṃskṛtadhātur asaṃkṛtadhātur apy avikalpāḥ?

original: subhūtir āha:

analyzed: yatra vā saṃsīdet evam caran bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sa indrakaiḥ devaiḥ

original: sabrahmakaiḥ saprajāpatikair namasyate. bhagavān āha:

analyzed: mahāsattvam namasyaṃti yaḥ evam prajñāparamitāyām carati ye api te subhūte tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ asaṃkhyeya aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu

original: tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti,
analyzed: tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti

analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran durdharṣaḥ bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ katamābhyām dvābhyām

analyzed: yathāvādī ca bhavati tathākārī

analyzed: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāḥ avirahita tvāt durādharṣāḥ bhavanti māreṇa vā māra kāyikābhiḥ vā devatābhiḥ

analyzed: sāyam prātar upasthānāya gacchanti

analyzed: anugacchanti tat yathā api nāma subhūte yāḥ kācid ku nadyaḥ sarvāḥ tāḥ yena gaṅgā nadī

analyzed: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītāḥ yena sarva ākāra jña tā tena anugacchanti tat yathā api nāma subhūte puruṣasya dakṣiṇa hastaḥ

analyzed: dāna pāramitā mama anugacchet evam śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā anugacchet na dāna pāramitāyāḥ evam bhavati

original: evaṃ bhavaty:

original: kasya hetoḥ?

original: kutaḥ iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agryā ākhyāyate jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītā anuttarā niruttarā asamasamā ākhyāyate.  #

original: bhagavān āha:

original: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
analyzed: evam etat subhūte evam etat

original: prajñāpāramitāṃ punar āgamya imāḥ paṃcapāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte nānāprakārā ātmabhāvāḥ sumeruṃ parvatarājam  #
analyzed: prajñāpāramitām punar āgamyaḥ imāḥ paṃca pāramitāḥ pāramitā nāmadheyam labhante tat yathā api nāma subhūte nānā prakārāḥ ātmabhāvāḥ sumerum parvata rājam

analyzed: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitām āgamya imāḥ paṃca pāramitāḥ pāramitā nāmadheyam labhante tāḥ sarva ākāra jña tām anupraviṣṭāḥ eka varṇāḥ bhavanti yat uta

original: na viśeṣaḥ kaścit prajñāyate iyan dānapāramitā iyaṃ śīlapāramitā iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā iyaṃ vīryapāramitā iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā.  #

original: tat kasya hetos?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy āsāṃ svabhāvo nāsti,

original: yadi bhagavaṃ nārthaprāptau kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā prajñāyate,

original: evam etat subhūte evam etat. nārthaprāptau kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā prajñāyate,
